alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 8:38PM PST until December 26 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTRY MIX OF SNOW, SLEET, AND FREEZING RAIN TONIGHT INTO TUESDAY MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations between a light glaze and 0.05". * WHERE...Odessa, Harrington, Quincy, Othello, Ritzville, Moses Lake, Waterville, Grand Coulee, Mansfield, Badger Mountain Road, Creston, Ephrata, Coulee City, and Wilbur. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau
